description: China’s citrus fruit ban came right before of the annual pomelo harvest.  Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Beijing's sudden import ban leaves Taiwanese pomelo growers scrambling
title_page: Beijing's sudden import ban leaves Taiwanese pomelo growers scrambling | The Straits Times
maintext:
Pomelo essential oil. Pomelo body wash. Dried pomelo peel. And pomelo jam.
These are just some of the processed pomelo products the Madou Farmers' Association in Taiwan has been busy churning out in the past two months.
